headline: Trump-Endorsed AZ GOP Gov. Candidate Loves Imprisoning People Without Charges, Except For When She Doesn't

Horrifically, Kari Lake is the current frontrunner for the GOP gubernatorial primary in Arizona, and the only Republican who beats Secretary of State Hobbs — whom, again, she would like to arrest on charges of "doing her job" — in a matchup.

Australian schools also do not have to conduct active shooter drills in order for kids to practice "not dying" in the event that one of their gun-toting classmates gets turned down for prom and decides to make everyone pay.

Before walking out in a huff, however, Lake managed to demonstrate her astoundingly deep misunderstandings of the situation with January 6 defendants, the US criminal justice system, Australian gun laws and COVID policies.
